name: NSDrawerDelegate
desc: A set of methods that drawer delegates implement to open, close, and resize the drawer.DeprecatedDrawers are deprecated and should not be used in modern macOS apps.

items.name: func drawerShouldOpen(NSDrawer) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate if the specified drawer should open.

items.name: func drawerWillOpen(Notification)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the drawer will open.

items.name: func drawerDidOpen(Notification)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the drawer has opened.

items.name: func drawerShouldClose(NSDrawer) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate if the specified drawer should close.

items.name: func drawerWillClose(Notification)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate the drawer will close.

items.name: func drawerDidClose(Notification)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that the drawer has closed.

items.name: func drawerWillResizeContents(NSDrawer, to: NSSize) -> NSSize
items.desc: Invoked when the user resizes the drawer or parent.
